Title: Vertigo
Plot: Following his early retirement as a detective from the San Francisco Police Department, John Ferguson - Scottie to his friends - becomes obsessed with two women in succession, those obsessions which trouble his long time friend and former fiancée, Midge Wood, a designer of women's undergarments. The first is wealthy and elegant platinum blonde Madeleine Elster, the wife of his college acquaintance Gavin Elster, who hires John to follow her in Gavin's belief that she may be a danger to herself in thinking that she has recently been possessed by the spirit of Carlotta Valdes, Madeleine's great-grandmother who she knows nothing about, but who Gavin knows committed suicide in being mentally unbalanced when she was twenty-six, Madeleine's current age. The second is Judy Barton, who John spots on the street one day. Judy is a working class girl, but what makes John obsessed with her is that, despite her working class style and her brunette hair, she is the spitting image of Madeleine, into ...
Awards: Top Rated Movies #93 | Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 5 nominations.
Writers: Alec Coppel, Samuel A. Taylor, Pierre Boileau, Thomas Narcejac, Maxwell Anderson
Stars: James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes, Tom Helmore
Tagline: A Hitchcock thriller. You should see it from the beginning!

Similars.Title: Rear Window
Similars.Plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
Similars.Stars: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey

Similars.Title: Psycho
Similars.Plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
Similars.Stars: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles

Similars.Title: North by Northwest
Similars.Plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.
Similars.Stars: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason

Similars.Title: Dial M for Murder
Similars.Plot: A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.
Similars.Stars: Ray Milland, Grace Kelly, Robert Cummings

Similars.Title: Rope
Similars.Plot: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.
Similars.Stars: James Stewart, John Dall, Farley Granger

Similars.Title: Citizen Kane
Similars.Plot: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.
Similars.Stars: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Dorothy Comingore

Similars.Title: Casablanca
Similars.Plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.
Similars.Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid

Similars.Title: The Birds
Similars.Plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.
Similars.Stars: Rod Taylor, Tippi Hedren, Jessica Tandy

Similars.Title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
Similars.Plot: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.
Similars.Stars: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester

Similars.Title: A Clockwork Orange
Similars.Plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
Similars.Stars: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates

Similars.Title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
Similars.FullTitle: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1964)
Similars.Plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
Similars.Stars: Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden

Similars.Title: The Wrong Man
Similars.Plot: In 1953, an innocent man named Christopher Emanuel "Manny" Balestrero is arrested after being mistaken for an armed robber.
Similars.Stars: Henry Fonda, Vera Miles, Anthony Quayle
